ygData.subject: Re: I'm a mob magnet...
ygData.msgSnippet: i have never had a MOB run for me, when in a party with a monk and a cleric. i stand back, cast whirl and choke and feckless might, and whirl over and over,
ygData.messageBody:
i have never had a MOB run for me, when in a party with a monk and a
cleric. i stand back, cast whirl and choke and feckless might, and whirl
over and over, and i never get touched even when whirl wears off...

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 20th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

At 12:08 PM 5/27/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
>mobs will always come for enchanters, even if there is a wizard nuking for
>a lot more damage than you. Insert a mesmerize every 2 or 3 spells and you
>wont be bothered.
>Skara
>

-------------------
tim borrelli
computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
Volition, Inc.
